mapper.insert: insert into schedule (destinationNum, scheduleStart, scheduleEnd, userNum) values (#{destinationNum}, #{scheduleStart}, #{scheduleEnd}, #{userNum})
mapper.select: SELECT s.scheduleNum AS scheduleNum, s.scheduleStart AS scheduleStart, s.scheduleEnd AS scheduleEnd, s.scheduleCreated AS scheduleCreated, s.userNum AS userNum, s.scheduleStatus AS scheduleStatus, s.destinationNum AS destinationNum, d.nameKo AS destinationName, d.destinationLat AS destinationLat, d.destinationLong AS destinationLong FROM schedule s JOIN destination d ON s.destinationNum = d.destinationNum WHERE s.userNum = #{userNum} AND s.scheduleStatus = '작성중' ORDER BY s.scheduleCreated DESC

SELECT s.scheduleNum, s.scheduleStart, s.scheduleEnd, s.userNum, s.destinationNum, d.nameKo AS destinationName, d.destinationLat, d.destinationLong FROM schedule s JOIN destination d ON s.destinationNum = d.destinationNum WHERE s.scheduleNum = #{scheduleNum} AND s.userNum = #{userNum}
